page.title: 09Southampton Container Depot
page.content: The Prince Charles Container Port & the Freightliner Terminal have many people working in them. A container is a way of carrying all sorts of things like machinery, furniture & food from here to other places in our country or around the world. {The Freightliner Terminal}: The containers are brought to the terminal by train or ship. The trains come along and stop where a crane will lift the container off the wagon. They put it on the ground to be picked up later or on a wagon to be pulled away by a train. They know where to put the containers down because they are all labelled. The crane is very large & it moves on tracks. It picks up containers & has to get a perfect hit because there are four holes in the top of each container which it must connect with.
